## TypedArrayConstructor type

Type of a typed array constructor

**Signature:**

```typescript
type TypedArrayConstructor<T extends TypedArray = any> = {
    new (): T;
    new (size: number): T;
    new (elements: number[]): T;
    new (buffer: ArrayBuffer): T;
    new (buffer: ArrayBuffer, byteOffset: number): T;
    new (buffer: ArrayBuffer, byteOffset: number, length: number): T;
    BYTES_PER_ELEMENT: number;
};
```
**References:** [TypedArray](doc/markdown/./base.typedarray.md)
